summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Low Income Elderly and Handicapped Housing Program, providing for the issuance and sale from time to time of its general obligation bond anticipation notes of the City in the principal amount of not to exceed $48,170,000 and refunding notes for the purpose of providing interim financing to pay the costs to develop, acquire, construct and rehabilitate additional housing for low-income elderly and handicapped persons in the City; providing the form and terms and conditions upon the issuance of said notes; and designating the City Comptroller to sell and deliver said notes and to fix their dates, interest rates, maturities and other details consistent with this ordinance.
